content:
No. It's ready now, I just need to put the final love on the branches, 5 minutes of work.

That is, I have added this as patch to the existing 5.10.0 version, creating s new release.

Note the difference between release (same sources) and version

I plan to publish this new release for Bookworm and Flatpak today, and think we should do the same for the Ubuntu branches to keep them on sync. Ok?

No more love is needed, all three branches are ready for upload. If you look into debian/changelog you can see the changes.

test builds at https://launchpad.net/~leamas-alec/+archive/ubuntu/opencpn. Some of these are usinng +3 instead of +2 for testing reasons but are otherwise identical
